SELECT /* IsfAppguideMapper.xml, getAppguideProdList, 앱가이드 개인화 추천 상품 리스트, 윤주영/SK플래닛 , 2014-02-06 */ COUNT(S.PROD_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , S.* FROM ( SELECT P.PROD_ID , P.SVC_GRP_CD , P.SVC_TYPE_CD , P.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD , P.META_CLSF_CD , P.TOP_MENU_ID , CP.MENU_ID , P2.PROD_ID AS PART_PROD_ID , ROW_NUMBER( ) OVER ( PARTITION BY PR.PROD_ID ORDER BY P2.REG_DT DESC ) AS RN FROM TB_DP_PROD_RSHP PR , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG CP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY C , TB_DP_PROD P , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_PROD P2 , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP2 WHERE 1 = 1
AND PR.PROD_ID IN ( #{pid} )
AND CP.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND C.MENU_ID = CP.MENU_ID AND P.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND TP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND P2.PROD_ID = PR.PART_PROD_ID -- EPISODE AND TP2.PROD_ID = P2.PROD_ID AND PR.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' AND CP.USE_YN = 'Y' AND CP.BASE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND P.TOP_MENU_ID <> 'DP02' AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantHeader.tenantId} AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND TP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TP2.TENANT_ID = #{tenantHeader.tenantId} AND TP2.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND TP2.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SH WHERE SH.PROD_ID = P2.PROD_ID AND (SH.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceHeader.model} OR SH.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{virtualDeviceModel}) ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM TB_CM_DEVICE PHI WHERE 1 = 1 AND PHI.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceHeader.model} AND PHI.USE_YN = 'Y' AND 'Y' = CASE WHEN P.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP13' THEN PHI.EBOOK_SPRT_YN WHEN P.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP14' THEN PHI.COMIC_SPRT_YN WHEN P.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP15' THEN PHI.SCL_SHPG_SPRT_YN WHEN P.TOP_MENU_ID = 'DP16' AND P2.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' THEN PHI.MUSIC_SPRT_YN WHEN P.TOP_MENU_ID IN ( 'DP17', 'DP18' ) THEN CASE WHEN PHI.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN = 'N' THEN CASE WHEN P2.DRM_YN ='N' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END ELSE 'Y' END ELSE 'Y' END ) ) S WHERE S.RN = 1

SELECT /* IsfAppguideMapper.xml, getRelProdList, 앱가이드 연관 상품 조회, 윤주영/SK플래닛, 2014-02-06 */ P.TOP_MENU_ID , CP.PROD_ID , PD.PROD_NM , TRIM(REPLACE((SELECT MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC WHERE MENU_ID = P.TOP_MENU_ID AND LANG_CD = #{tenantHeader.langCd}), 'TOP', '')) AS TOP_MENU_NM , DC.MENU_NM FROM TB_DP_PROD P , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP PR , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG CP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY C , TB_DP_PROD_DESC PD , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC DC , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP WHERE P.PROD_ID = PR.PROD_ID AND CP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND PD.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND CP.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND DC.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND P.PROD_ID = TP.PROD_ID AND TP.TENANT_ID = #{tenantHeader.tenantId} AND DC.LANG_CD = #{tenantHeader.langCd} AND PR.PROD_RSHP_CD = 'DP010802' /* 채널-에피소드 상품 관계 */
AND PR.PART_PROD_ID IN ( #{pid} )
